utf-8\\nimport workflow\\nimport editor\\nimport clipboard\\nimport difflib\\nfrom StringIO import StringIO\\nimport cgi\\n\\ndef html_diff(a, b):\\n\\tseq = difflib.SequenceMatcher(None, a, b)\\n\\topcodes = seq.get_opcodes()\\n\\tout = StringIO()\\n\\tfor op, a0, a1, b0, b1 in opcodes:\\n\\t\\tif op == 'equal':\\n\\t\\t\\tout.write(a[a0:a1])\\n\\t\\tif op == 'insert' or op == 'replace':\\n\\t\\t\\tout.write('<ins>' + b[b0:b1] + '<\\\/ins>')\\n\\t\\tif op == 'delete' or op == 'replace':\\n\\t\\t\\tout.write('<del>' + a[a0:a1] + '<\\\/del>')\\n\\treturn out.getvalue()\\n\\ndef main():\\n\\ttheme = editor.get_theme()\\n\\tworkflow.set_variable('CSS', workflow.get_variable('CSS Dark' if theme == 'Dark' else 'CSS Light'))\\n\\ta = cgi.escape(editor.get_text())\\n\\tb = cgi.escape(workflow.get_variable('replacedtext'))\\n\\thtml = html_diff(a, b)\\n\\tworkflow.set_output(html)\\n\\nif __name__ == '__main__':\\n\\tmain()\\n\"},\"pauseWithoutShowingParameters\":false},{\"class\":\"WorkflowActionShowHTMLPreview\",\"pauseBeforeRunning\":false,\"customTitle\":\"\",\"parameters\":{\"title\":\"Diff\",\"baseURL\":\"\",\"html\":{\"tokenRanges\":{\"{117,
